Caption: Dr. Edhard Eppler addresses the audience at the Special Convocation. On the dais, from the left; Mr. C.V. Sethunathan, Prof. S. Sampath, Prof. K.T. Chandy, Mr. C. Subramaniam (Union Minister), Prof. K.A.V. Pandalai ( Director), Prof. A. Ramachandran
Event: Special Convocation, Inauguration of Computer Centre
